snippet: The Court of Cassation said the inquiries into the killing of Meredith Kercher, for which Ms. Knox was convicted and later cleared, were flawed from the start.
abstract: Court of Cassation, Italy's highest court, says investigation of Amanda Knox and her former boyfriend Raffaele Sollecito in connection with murder of Meredith Kercher was flawed from start.
lead_paragraph: The Court of Cassation said the inquiries into the killing of Meredith Kercher, for which Ms. Knox was convicted and later cleared, were flawed from the start.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Italy: Court Details Flaws in Knox Case
headline.main: Italy’s Highest Court Explains Decision to Clear Amanda Knox
